09-26-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability={{AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20}} Pulse Grenade|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20}} Pulse Grenade T3 now also grants +2% Damage Amp

- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20}} Kinetic Carbine cooldown increased from 24s to 28s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20}} Kinetic Carbine speed duration reduced from 4s to 3.5s

- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20}} Kinetic Carbine no longer affects channels, cast times or things like {{HeroIcon|Hero=Lash|Size=20}} Lash's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20}} Death Slam
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20}} Kinetic Carbine T1 reduced from +0.75s Max Stop duration to +0.5s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20}} Kinetic Carbine T2 cd reduction increased from -8s to -10s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Time Wall|Size=20}} Time Wall T3 silence duration reduced from 3.5s to 3s
- {{HeroIcon|Hero=Paradox|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Paradoxical Swap|Size=20}} Paradoxical Swap projectile size reduced by 10%
08-01-2024: - Fixed {{HeroIcon|Hero=Paradox|Size=20}} Paradox Swap sometimes putting players behind walls
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20}} Kinetic Carbine Time Slowed targets that were moving before the time slow will now resume their momentum when time slow wears off
- Bullet (and {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20}} Kinetic Carbine) projectile speed reduced by 10%
07-18-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Time Wall|Size=20}} Time Wall projectile stop duration reduced from 1.25s to 1s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability={{AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20}} Pulse Grenade|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20}} Pulse Grenade amp duration increased from 6s to 8s
- {{HeroIcon|Hero=Paradox|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Paradoxical Swap|Size=20}} Paradoxical Swap projectile size reduced by 10%
07-11-2024: - Fixed the following abilities changing their launch direction if the player snapped their camera quickly during the cast time: {{HeroIcon|Hero=Ivy|Size=20}} Ivy's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Kudzu Bomb|Size=20}} Kudzu Bomb, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Paradox|Size=20}} Paradox's {{AbilityIcon|Ability={{AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20}} Pulse Grenade|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20}} Pulse Grenade, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Warden|Size=20}} Warden's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20}} Alchemical Flask, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Vindicta|Size=20}} Vindicta's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Stake|Size=20}} Stake, {{ItemIcon|Item=Alchemical Fire|Size=20}} Alchemical Fire (T3 Weapon item)
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Time Wall|Size=20}} Time Wall projectiles and bullets being stuck in the wall for its full duration instead of for the shorter time stop duration
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20}} Kinetic Carbine collision radius reduced by 10%

- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability={{AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20}} Pulse Grenade|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20}} Pulse Grenade not going where you had targeted if you moved quickly during the cast
